description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Silverbeet Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin & Silverbeet Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Trim ends of the silverbeet and thoroughly wash leaves in plenty of cold water. Cut along either side of white stalk and discard. Drain leaves.
Peel pumpkin, remove seeds and roughly chop.
Heat butter and oil in a large pan. Add onion, celery and garlic and cook gently for 5 minutes until very soft.
Add pumpkin, water or stock and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until pumpkin is tender.
Pur√©e the pumpkin in a food processor or with a hand-held stick blender until smooth. Season and add silverbeet.
Reheat gently to wilt silverbeet. Serve with toast.
